column2: 活动期间，每日探索游戏，完成相应任务，收集先行者的碎片。利用碎片兑换先知为你准备的特别奖励！
column3: During the event period, explore the game and complete specified tasks to collect Forerunner Fragments. These fragments can be used to exchange for rewards!
